flavorText: He scowls at his imperfect creation, then crushes it to scrap. He salvages the etherium and begins anew.

foreignData.flavorText: Er blickt seine unausgereifte Kreation finster an und zerquetscht sie zu Schrott. Dann rettet er das Ätherium und fängt wieder von vorne an.
foreignData.name: Puppenbeschwörer
foreignData.text:
{U}, {T}: Bringe einen 0/1 blauen Homunkulus-Artefaktkreaturenspielstein ins Spiel.
Opfere zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments einen Homunkulus.

foreignData.flavorText: Mira con desdén la creación imperfecta, luego la hace añicos. Rescata el eterium y comienza de nuevo.
foreignData.name: Conjurador de títeres
foreignData.text:
{U}, {T}: Pon en juego una ficha de criatura artefacto Homúnculo azul 0/1.
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, sacrifica un Homúnculo.

foreignData.flavorText: Il jette un regard de dégoût à sa création imparfaite, puis la réduit en miettes. Il récupère ensuite l'étherium et recommence.
foreignData.name: Conjurateur de marionnettes
foreignData.text:

Au début de votre entretien, sacrifiez un homoncule.

foreignData.flavorText: Osserva con sguardo torvo la sua creazione imperfetta, poi la fa a pezzi. Recupera l'eterium e ricomincia da capo.
foreignData.name: Evocatore di Burattini
foreignData.text:
{U}, {T}: Metti in gioco una pedina creatura artefatto Omuncolo 0/1 blu.
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, sacrifica un Omuncolo.

foreignData.flavorText: 彼は自身の不完全な創造物をねめつけ、叩き潰して鉄くずにする。 彼はそこからエーテリウムを抜き出し、話は始めに戻る。
foreignData.name: くぐつの妖術師
foreignData.text:

foreignData.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: Ele olha com desprezo para suas criações imperfeitas, estraçalhando-as em seguida. Então, ele recupera o etherium e começa tudo de novo.

foreignData.flavorText: Он хмуро смотрит на свое несовершенное творение и разбивает его на куски. Затем он собирает эфирий и начинает все заново.

foreignData.flavorText: 他对着自己未尽完美的造物皱眉，然后将它砸成废铁。 之后将乙金回收，重新来过。

name: Puppet Conjurer
originalText:
{U}, {T}: Put a 0/1 blue Homunculus artifact creature token into play.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a Homunculus.

rulings.text: The only difference between a colored artifact and a colorless artifact is, obviously, its color. Unlike most artifacts, a colored artifact requires colored mana to cast. Also unlike most artifacts, a colored artifact has a color in all zones. It will interact with cards that care about color. Other than that, a colored artifact behaves just like any other artifact. It will interact as normal with any card that cares about artifacts, such as Shatter or Arcbound Ravager.
The Homunculus you sacrifice due to the second ability isn’t limited to being a Homunculus token put onto the battlefield by Puppet Conjurer.
If you control no Homunculi when the second ability resolves, nothing happens. There’s no penalty for failing to sacrifice a Homunculus.

text:
{U}, {T}: Create a 0/1 blue Homunculus artifact creature token.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a Homunculus.
